translation.en: [narrator] In your homes, listening to this broadcast.
translation.it: Ecco, ancora una volta, il diretto rapido

translation.en: There it is again, the sharp jab from Miguel Galíndez,
translation.it: Ecco, ancora una volta, il diretto rapido di Miguel Galindez.

translation.en: limiting the movements of a confused "Tremendo" Duarte.
translation.it: Marca il perimetro e domina i movimenti di Duarte "Il Terribile",

translation.en: Friends, he's having a hard time this round.
translation.it: che fa fatica, in questo round.

translation.en: And Bayoneta is here again, pushing forward and imposing himself on the ring.
translation.it: Ed ecco Bayoneta, che avanza e s'impone sul ring.

translation.en: The hook Duarte had to take! The unfortunate boxer from Juriquilla!
translation.it: e s'impone sul ring. Duarte riceve un bel gancio!

translation.en: He's been knocked out much too early in the match.
translation.it: Va subito a terra, in questo incontro.

translation.en: The referee is already doing the safety countdown.
translation.it: L'arbitro inizia il conto alla rovescia.

translation.en: One, two, three, four.
Are you OK?
These things happen, dude.
OK?
There, there.
Hey, kid, it's not your fault. Come on. Come on.
translation.it: Ehi, non è colpa tua. Forza.

translation.en: -[man cries] -It's OK. -Calm down. -[man cries]
-Hey, hey, wait, come on. -[man cries]
-Hey, hey, hey. -Don't do that! Don't!
-[woman] Miguel? -Miguel! Fuck, stop it!
-[woman] What's wrong with Miguel? -[man] The doctor is coming.
What's wrong?
-What's wrong? -[Miguel cries]
Hey, good morning.
-[background conversations] -Bye-bye!
Where the hell are you?
Where the hell are you, man?
Where the hell are you?
Where was it?
Dude.
Hey, dude, raise your elbow, you know? Keep it straight up, always.
translation.it: Bene. Alza il gomito, ok? Tienilo qui,

translation.en: [man] Hey, Mickey!
-I need you here. -[Miguel] Yeah.
The Mexican is not going to let you breathe, at least not in the early rounds.
translation.it: Lui non ti darà respiro. Almeno non nei primi round, ok?

translation.en: So you keep on moving. You use your diagonals.
translation.it: Quindi muoviti sempre, specie in diagonale.

translation.en: -Let's go, show him. -OK.
So, you've got to work Carmona from a distance, all the time.
If he shortens the distance, you try to escape, like this.
So, keep it all the time.
-Good? -OK, now you block his way.
translation.it: - Capito? - Sì. - Ok. - Ora bloccagli la strada.

translation.en: -OK. -OK, so, this way.
And now this way.
-This way, yeah, block, block! -I see.
translation.it: E qui. Bene. Blocca. - Blocca. - Sì.

translation.en: Block, down. Good, this way. Again.
translation.it: - Blocca. - Sì. Giù. Bravo. Da questa parte. Ancora.

translation.en: Block. Yeah, good.
-Now, you're going to meet Tony. -Yeah, OK.
translation.it: Bueno. Ora con Tommy. Va bene.

translation.en: [in Finnish] Is anyone going to sauna?
[knocks] You wanted to see us?
[owner] Yeah, come on in, both.
[owner] Sit down, sit down.
OK. Are we on schedule with Remu?
Yeah. He's on point, physically.
Yeah, and Carmona is not the same as he was before.
translation.it: Beh, Carmona non è più come prima.

translation.en: Five years ago, he would've killed him, but I think now we have a chance.
translation.it: Un tempo l'avrebbe ucciso, ma ora, credo... sia fattibile.

translation.en: [in Finnish] Fuck, fuck! God damn it!
You're ready for the sparring sessions?
I hate it too, this cold weather.
It's like when we were in Buffalo, remember?
No, this is much worse.
translation.it: Già. Ma qui è molto peggio.

translation.en: I don't hate it. It just makes me too aware of everything.
translation.it: Non lo odio, ma mi rende troppo conscio di tutto.

translation.en: Too aware of my body.
Listen, Mickey.
We'll go through this fight, Remu wins, make some money to start over again.
translation.it: Senti, Mickey. Facciamo questo incontro. Se Remu vince, facciamo soldi per ricominciare.

translation.en: Then, we might go our separate ways, but it won't happen like this,
translation.it: Poi ognuno per sé, ma così non funzionerà.

translation.en: -when you're late every fucking morning. -Yeah.
Yeah, maybe this was a mistake, no?
translation.it: Forse è stato un errore, no?

translation.en: [woman in Spanish] Hello?
Hello?
Who's this?
-[girl] Who's this? -[woman] Hang up, Yovana.
[Miguel] Come on!
[man] Focus on the body, and get out.
-[in French] Shit! -Long punches, Remu!
It's on fire!
Hey, cool off, man. It's not going to be so easy with Carmona.
translation.it: Ehi, abbassa la cresta. Carmona sarà tosto.

translation.en: Stretch your arms, man, you look like a kid.
translation.it: Allunga le braccia. Sembri un bambino.

translation.en: How do you think you're going to hit him with those tiny arms?
Jump in, Mexican bitch.
Come on, fucking jump in, let's dance.
-Yeah, keep going. -You want to jiggle with this?
[Remu] Fucking punk.
[in Finnish] All right, again! Go on. Leave him no chance!
[in Finnish] Remu! Are you gonna win the championship for us?
translation.it: Remu! Vincerai il campionato per noi?

translation.en: Sarita. Look.
-What? -He's my Mexican friend, Mickey. Sarita.
translation.it: Lui è il mio amico messicano, Mickey. Sarita.

translation.en: -[Miguel] Hey. -[Remu] Want a beer?
-[Miguel] Sure. -One beer, and a soda water for me.
translation.it: - Vuoi una birra? - Sì, certo. Una birra e per me acqua gassata.

translation.en: -[Miguel] Is she your wife? -[Remu] No, you're married?
translation.it: - È tua moglie? - No. - Sposato? - Ho una figlia.

translation.en: [Miguel] I have a daughter.
-For your daughter. -[Miguel] Cheers.
[Remu] Cheers.
You're doing great, man. Your legs are moving better now.
translation.it: Stai andando bene. Muovi meglio le gambe.

translation.en: All I know is giving and taking punches.
translation.it: So solo dare pugni e incassarli.

translation.en: Yeah, well. I guess we can call that a job.
translation.it: Sì, beh. Potremmo definirlo un lavoro.

translation.en: Hey, I'll be back in a second.
[in Finnish] OK, hey.
-Need anything, Mickey? -[Miguel] No.
What was your name, again?
The blows to the head must be affecting your memory.
translation.it: I colpi alla testa ti hanno reso smemorato.

translation.en: [Sarita] Sarita.
Sarita. That's a Mexican name.
Do I look Mexican to you?
[in Finnish] Karaoke here this Saturday.
translation.it: Ci sarà il karaoke questo sabato.

translation.en: -[Miguel] What's up? -What's up?
[Miguel] I came to see Ramiro.
Come on in.
[boy] Dad. Someone's looking for you.
-What's up, dude? It's the Yeti himself! -[Miguel] How are you.
translation.it: - Ehi. - Come va? L'uomo delle nevi!

translation.en: -How are you, Baby? -How have you been?
translation.it: - Come butta, Bimbo? - Tu come stai?

translation.en: -I'm good, and you? -I'm great, what's up?
translation.it: - Bene. Tu? - Tutto bene. Che si dice?

translation.en: -Not much. -That's a big secret you kept from me.
translation.it: - Non molto. - Avevi la lingua lunga, eh!

translation.en: So you already told those Vikings everything about me?
translation.it: Avrai già spifferato tutto su di me, ai vichinghi.

translation.en: The only thing "baby" about you is your nickname, right?
Screw that "baby" thing. Hey, son!
-Come here. -[Miguel] What's up?
-[boy] Hi. -Even though he looks like a mangy dog,
translation.it: Anche se sembra un cane secco,

translation.en: he was the best at the delegation of 2004.
translation.it: era il migliore del team olimpico del 2004.

translation.en: -[boy] Oh? -"Bayoneta" Galíndez, medal winner.
translation.it: Bayoneta Galindez. Ha vinto una medaglia e tutto.

translation.en: -[boy] Oh? -Nice to meet you. [boy] Nice to meet you.
-Remember, you horn bag? -Me?
You were trying to fuck all the Chinese synchronized swimmers.
translation.it: Volevi farti tutta la squadra cinese di nuoto.

translation.en: And you were trying to fuck the entire Olympic village.
-That was something dude. -It really was, man.
-[Roberto] Mr. Nacho, look who's here! -Hi, Mr. Nacho.
translation.it: - Che pancia. Don Nacho. - Come va?

translation.en: -[Ramiro] It's been a while. -Oh, yes. How are you?
translation.it: - Una birra? - Sì. - Da quanto tempo. - Come va?

translation.en: I was glad to hear you were working here.
translation.it: Sono stato contento di sapere che avresti lavorato qui.

translation.en: Oh, thanks.
And with that fucker, Denis. How did that happen?
translation.it: E con quel coglione, Dennis. Com'è successo?

translation.en: -[Miguel sighs] -What happened there?
Well... It was a huge surprise for me too, to be honest.
translation.it: Beh... È stata una sorpresa anche per me.

translation.en: [boy] Hey, Mickey.
-Did you show our style to the Vikings? -Shut up, dude.
translation.it: Hai detto tutto ai vichinghi? Zitto, ragazzo!

translation.en: Hey, in all honesty, what's that guy's kryptonite?
translation.it: Ma dimmi... Qual è il suo punto debole?

translation.en: Should I kick his balls, or bite his tits?
Put a bottle of vodka in his dressing room, and you'll see.
translation.it: Lasciagli la vodka in camerino e vedrai.

translation.en: [man] Hey, Mickey. A gift.
-Oh, come on! -Nice!
-Are you going to eat them here? -Yes, this is nice, man.
translation.it: - Ti siedi e li mangi. - Che regalo.

translation.en: -[Rodrigo laughs] Cool. -Spicy, man.
-You brought the sauce? -[man] Sure do!
[woman] Hello?
-[woman] Hello? -[Miguel] Erika.
[Erika] Miguel?
How's Yovana?
[Erika] Is it really you?
[Erika] Is it?
[Erika] Weren't you dead?
I'd like to talk to her, if you don't mind.
translation.it: Vorrei parlarle, se ti va bene.

translation.en: [Erika] She grew up, Miguel.
I want to help, Erika.
I want you to be able to count on me.
translation.it: Voglio che conti su di me.

translation.en: I'd like to be a father for Yovana, and...
translation.it: Potrei tornare a fare il padre di Yovana...

translation.en: I have a job here. I'm about to get some money...
translation.it: Ho un lavoro, sono in arrivo dei soldi e...

translation.en: And I want to come back.
I want my life back.
[Erika] So you're back from the dead, after four years?
translation.it: Torni dai morti dopo quattro anni.

translation.en: [Denis] Hey, Mickey! You can come up here, we need you.
translation.it: Ehi, Mickey! Vieni quassù. Ci servi.

translation.en: [Denis] Mickey!
[referee] I want a clean fight no holding, no hitting below the belt.
translation.it: Scontro pulito. Niente trattenute né colpi sotto la cinta.

translation.en: Good luck and have a good fight.
Keep moving. Fight from the outside, and don't stay on the ropes too long.
translation.it: Muoviti sempre. Resta all'esterno e fuori portata.

translation.en: [Miguel] Come on, Remu.
[Miguel] Come on, Remu, good.
[Miguel] Be careful.
-Get out of there! -Stay out of reach, man, come on!
Stay closer.
Don't let him to get so close. If he gets his teeth on you, he won't let go.
translation.it: Non farlo avvicinare. Non è uno che molla la presa.

translation.en: [Remu] Look at his eye. I can knock him out, boss, I can take him out.
translation.it: Guardami. Posso mandarlo al tappeto. Posso farcela.

translation.en: [Denis] Hey, move forward, move forward!
[referee] Hey, let him go!
Hey, hey, hey! The mouthpiece! He's wining time. That's fucking low, you bastard!
translation.it: Ehi! Il paradenti. Vuole prendere tempo. È scorretto, bastardo.

translation.en: Two, three, four.
You've got the points. Don't do anything foolish.
OK.
[referee] OK, go to your corner.
-[bell rings] -Go!
Watch his jab, watch his jab!
-[Denis] Come on, kid! -[Nacho] Hit him, hit him!
-[bell ringing] -Why are you stopping now?
[Denis] Why'd you stop the fight now? Why the fuck did you stop now?
translation.it: Perché fermi lo scontro? Perché... proprio ora?

translation.en: [Denis] Don't stop, come on. He spits his fucking mouthpiece and you stop the fight?
translation.it: No. Forza! Lui sputa il cazzo di paradenti e fermi tutto?

translation.en: Jesus Christ, man.
[man in Finnish] Go on, Jyrki! Kill him!
-[Jyrki] I invested in this. -[man] Yes, you did. I know.
translation.it: Ehi. - Ci ho investito parecchio... - Sì, lo so.

translation.en: -[Miguel] You OK? -[Jyrki] Better than ever.
[Jyrki] It's not every day you lose...
a big match like that.
Yeah. Come on, have a drink.
translation.it: - Dai, bevi un po'. - No. Sto bene così.

translation.en: -No, I'm good. -Hey, take it.
translation.it: - Dai, bevi un po'. - No. Sto bene così. - Dai, bevi... - No, grazie.

translation.en: -I'm good. -Take a drink, you know? Let's celebrate.
translation.it: - Dai, bevi... - No, grazie. Beviamo. Festeggiamo, forza.

translation.en: [in Finnish] Come on! A little sip of jallu. Go on, take some!
translation.it: Beviamo. Festeggiamo, forza. Un goccetto di Jallu. Dai, bevi.

translation.en: Hey! Come on!
-Easy, easy. Huh? -Hey!
You know? It was my fault.
-[man speaking Finnish] -[Jyrki] I chose wrong, you know?
translation.it: - Ho fatto una scelta sbagliata. - Jaakko!

translation.en: [Jyrki] Jaakko! God damn it!
[Jaakko] Hey, hey. Like... what, Jyrki?
-[Jyrki] You can't fucking-- -[Jaakko] What? Come on, Jyrki! Hello!
translation.it: Cazzo, non puoi... Cosa? Andiamo, Jyrki!

translation.en: It's me, Jaakko. Come on, now! Seriously!
-Everything's OK! -OK, I get it.
[in Finnish] I get it, I get it.
-God damn it. -[Jaakko] Oh, Jyrki, look at you...
-[Jaakko] Nighty night. -[Jyrki] Go away.
[Jaakko] Thank you, Mr. Jaakko, for taking care of a friend.
translation.it: Grazie, sig. Jaakko, per essersi occupato del suo amico.

translation.en: -[Jaakko] Let's go! -Where?
-Let's go to the bar. To the bar, yeah? -No, I'm OK, thanks.
translation.it: Andiamo al bar! - Al bar, sì. - Non serve.

translation.en: Let's get a couple of drinks. No?
translation.it: Una festa, un paio di halogenos, sai...

translation.en: You think he's OK? [Jaakko] He's OK. Better than ever, you know?
translation.it: - Lui sta bene? - Sì. Mai stato meglio.

translation.en: [Jaakko] Crazy, right?
-What? -Ice hockey. Violent game for simpletons.
translation.it: - Cosa? - L'hockey su ghiaccio. Un gioco violento per fessi.

translation.en: Actually, fights are not allowed in real hockey.
translation.it: In realtà gli scontri non sono ammessi nel vero hockey.

translation.en: It's an American thing. It's pure simulations. Show business.
translation.it: È una cosa americana. Pura simulazione, spettacolo.

translation.en: When one of the knees touches the ice, the fighting stops, and the game goes on.
translation.it: Se le ginocchia toccano terra, li separano e la partita continua.

translation.en: Boxing is...
More dreadful. It's more like life, you know?
I saw you in Austin.
When you knocked out that Nicaraguan, what was his name?
-Yeah, Madrigal Rivas. -Yes! He was a... a serious...
translation.it: - Già. Madrigal Rivas. - Sì. Era quasi un anestesista...

translation.en: anesthetist. A real knock-out artist.
translation.it: Era quasi un anestesista... Un artista del KO.

translation.en: A no-brain, but some don't need it.
translation.it: Senza cervello, ma ad alcuni non serve.

translation.en: You made a lot of people lose money that night.
translation.it: Hai fatto perdere soldi a un sacco di gente, quella sera.

translation.en: You were a five to one on the dock, Bayoneta.
translation.it: Eri dato cinque a uno, Bayoneta.

translation.en: I never liked that nickname. I think it's stupid.
translation.it: Non mi piace come soprannome. È sciocco.

translation.en: Perhaps. Bayoneta is a rustic weapon.
translation.it: Può darsi. La baionetta è... ...un'arma grezza da contadini.

translation.en: For peasants. Your thing was always more subtle.
translation.it: ...un'arma grezza da contadini. Il tuo stile è molto più sottile.

translation.en: Yeah, that's the kind of thing people say when they're behind a microphone.
translation.it: Quello è il genere di cose... ...che dice chi sta dietro il microfono.

translation.en: Maybe, but... journalists will see you always with a mixture of...
translation.it: Può darsi. Ma, sai, siamo giornalisti. Vi guardiamo con rispetto misto a invidia e pietà...

translation.en: -respect, envy, and pity. Its-- -Why envy? You can write your whole life.
translation.it: Vi guardiamo con rispetto misto a invidia e pietà... Invidia? Tu potrai scrivere sempre.

translation.en: [Jaakko laughs] But there are eternal boxers too. Take a look at Carmona.
translation.it: Già. Ma ci sono anche... pugili eterni.

translation.en: No way, no. Carmona, he's just searching for the last bit of applause.
translation.it: - Guarda Carmona. - No, proprio no. Carmona cerca solo altri applausi

translation.en: And he's searching for the last few dollars.
You see? That's the kind of thing you people will never understand.
translation.it: È il genere di cose che non capirete mai.

translation.en: When you're hungry and healthy, nobody cares what can happen to you.
translation.it: Quando sei in forma... ...trascurano la tua salute.

translation.en: But, when you start making serious money,
a doctor shows up and says: "No more."
But that wasn't what happened to you.
translation.it: A te questo non è successo, però.

translation.en: You got an early retirement after that fight with "Tremendo" Duarte.
translation.it: Ti sei ritirato in anticipo, dopo quella lotta - contro Duarte. - Già.

translation.en: But I'm surprised you even know about that.
translation.it: Mi sorprende che tu... lo sappia.

translation.en: It was talked about, you know?
-Especially because of all the rumors-- -What rumors?
translation.it: Soprattutto per le voci che giravano. Quali voci?

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about? What do you know about that?
translation.it: Di che cazzo parli? Cosa ne sai?

translation.en: Those were all lies, you know?
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to imply anything.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. - Non volevo insinuare niente. - Bene.

translation.en: Good.
-Look at me. I'm sorry. -It's all good.
Miguel. Please, I'm sorry.
-[Sarita] You! -[man] Can I have another one?
translation.it: - Sei tu? - Ehi. Un altro giro?

translation.en: [Sarita] Yes.
You have a touch for beer.
translation.it: Hai un dono per la birra.

translation.en: There you go.
Just the right amount of foam.
I sure didn't know you were an expert.
There's a lot of things you don't know about me.
translation.it: Non sai molte cose di me.

translation.en: I'll buy you a drink.
Of all the places in the world, I never thought I would end up here.
translation.it: Di tutti i posti del mondo, sono finito proprio qui.

translation.en: I mean, if you put a map in front of me and ask: "Hey, Mickey, where's Finland?"
translation.it: Se mi mostrassi una mappa e chiedessi: "Dov'è la Finlandia?"

translation.en: I'd have no idea.
I mean, I knew it was near London, or something, but...
translation.it: Cioè, so che è vicina a Londra, tipo...

translation.en: Yeah, well, I have no idea where Tijuana is.
translation.it: Io non ho idea di dove sia Tijuana.

translation.en: That... is a hole, at the border with the "gringos."
translation.it: È un covo al confine coi gringo.

translation.en: You're not missing anything.
-But there's sun, right? -Yes.
translation.it: - Almeno c'è il sole, no? - Già.

translation.en: Here, it's always night.
You get used to it, I guess. Why Finland?
translation.it: Già, poi ti ci abitui. Perché sei qui?

translation.en: I came to train Remu.
So you retired from boxing, but you couldn't stay away?
translation.it: Hai lasciato la boxe ma non puoi farne a meno?

translation.en: I guess.
You should.
Oh. Is this yours?
Yup. I know. Old and dead, like my soul.
translation.it: Sì, lo so. Vecchia e sporca, come la mia anima.

translation.en: You should go, before you freeze to death.
[narrator] Galíndez keeps showing great leg power
translation.it: Galindez ha ancora forza nelle gambe,

translation.en: despite the punishment received at the hands of the Nicaraguan.
translation.it: nonostante i brutti colpi del nicaraguense.

translation.en: He tries again with a jab. He tries again to combine them,
translation.it: Prova ancora a combinare dei diretti,

translation.en: and he takes a breather to try to find possible gaps in Madrigal's defenses.
translation.it: prende fiato e cerca aperture nella guardia di Rivas.

translation.en: Watch out! That left punch did hurt, Galíndez moves, he's taken to the ropes.
translation.it: Attenzione! Quel sinistro ha fatto male! Galindez avanza, lo porta alle corde!

translation.en: One, two, another left punch, and the referee stops the fight!
translation.it: Uno, due! Un altro! Sinistro! L'arbitro ferma la lotta!

translation.en: Gentlemen, another triumph for this boy, Galíndez, who went against all odds
translation.it: Un altro trionfo per questo giovane che ribalta tutte le previsioni!

translation.en: and imposes himself against Madrigal Rivas, a seasoned fighter!
translation.it: Si è imposto sul "Torero" Madrigal Rivas, un lottatore impavido!

translation.en: He celebrates in his corner. Let's watch the replay.
translation.it: Festeggia nel suo angolo. Guardiamo il replay!

translation.en: The moment when Galíndez penetrates Madrigal Rivas' defenses, with technique.
translation.it: Il momento in cui Galindez penetra la difesa di Rivas con grande tecnica.

translation.en: Watch out for him, he could be one of the next aces of Mexican boxing.
translation.it: Tenete d'occhio Bayoneta, un possibile nuovo fenomeno della boxe messicana.

translation.en: I'm talking of course of Bayoneta and his strong right arm,
translation.it: della boxe messicana. Ha un gran destro e un passato olimpico. Lo ricordiamo da Sydney.

translation.en: He also has an Olympic past, remember Sydney?
translation.it: Ha un gran destro e un passato olimpico. Lo ricordiamo da Sydney.

translation.en: Think of him as someone in the international leagues, my friends.
translation.it: Ha un gran destro e un passato olimpico. Lo ricordiamo da Sydney. Ora è ai livelli internazionali, amici.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hey.
-You came in early. -Yeah, I couldn't sleep.
translation.it: - Sei arrivato prima. - Non riuscivo a dormire.

translation.en: Mickey, there's something I have to tell you.
What?
Jyrki is bankrupt.
He thought the fight would bail him out, so he mortgaged the gym. He can't pay us.
translation.it: Sperava nell'incontro e ha ipotecato la palestra. Non può pagarci.

translation.en: What are we going to do?
We can only wait.
Motherfucker.
[in French] Shit!
IS THIS YOUR NUMBER, DAD?
Hi.
[Denis] Good, good. OK, great!
Very good. Nice.
Miguel. What are you doing here?
Could you train me again?
-[Denis] What? -You heard me.
I want to fight. I want you-- I want you to train me again.
translation.it: Voglio combattere. Voglio... che tu mi alleni ancora.

translation.en: -[Denis] Are you fucking crazy? -No.
I can do it. I still have something to give.
translation.it: Posso farcela. Ho ancora molto da dare.

translation.en: I need the money. I need the money for my daughter. We need the money. We do.
translation.it: Mi servono soldi. Mi servono i soldi per mia figlia. Mi... Ci servono.

translation.en: -[bell ringing] -[Denis] Time!
translation.it: Mi servono i soldi per mia figlia. Mi... Ci servono. Tempo!

translation.en: I realized it's the only way, you know?
translation.it: Ho capito che è l'unico modo.

translation.en: We do a good fight.
And then we can stop thinking about that every fucking day.
translation.it: E ci togliamo questo cazzo di pensiero.

translation.en: No. OK? Get that idea out of your head.
[Denis] Good!
-[Jyrki] There's 30, and four. -[Miguel] Hey.
[man in Finnish] OK, I'll take it from here.
So now you know.
The lease on the building expires in two months.
translation.it: L'affitto dell'edificio scade tra due mesi.

translation.en: Then I'm out on the street.
-Sorry I lied to you. -That's OK.
translation.it: Scusa, ti ho mentito. Fa niente.

translation.en: Doesn't matter anymore.
I need to fight.
Did you hear what I said?
Yeah.
Some days, I wake up and I feel this...
translation.it: A volte... mi sveglio e... ...sento come un...

translation.en: hole in my chest.
And I think... I can't stop thinking.
Crazy shit.
I don't have to know your reasons, Mickey.
translation.it: Non mi serve sapere le tue ragioni, Mickey.

translation.en: I'll pay you. We all help one another.
translation.it: Ti pagherò. Insomma, ci aiutiamo a vicenda.

translation.en: -Hey, Mickey. -Hey.
You're exaggerating, it's not so cold.
How did you make a living after you retired?
translation.it: Come hai fatto a campare dopo il ritiro?

translation.en: [Miguel] I worked in a cruise ship, doing the laundry.
translation.it: Lavavo i panni su una nave da crociera.

translation.en: And once, the singer of the ship got sick, so I did the show.
translation.it: Una volta il cantante della nave si ammalò e cantai io.

translation.en: -Now you're lying. -I don't lie.
-Yes, you lie. -I don't.
-[Sarita] I don't believe you. -[Miguel] It was a huge success.
[Miguel] The ladies were all over me.
-Come on. Sing for me. -No.
I knew you were a liar.
♪ The moment has come ♪
♪ To talk, sweetheart ♪
♪ Without lies ♪
♪ I've waited a long time To see if you've changed, but you ♪
translation.it: Ho aspettato così tanto Che tu cambiassi

translation.en: ♪ Don't even look at me ♪
♪ You said at the beginning That once that snow arrived ♪
translation.it: All'inizio dicevi Che all'arrivo delle nevi di gennaio

translation.en: ♪ In January ♪
translation.it: Che all'arrivo delle nevi di gennaio

translation.en: ♪ We'd go see the virgin And get married, and it would be ♪
translation.it: Saremmo andati a vedere la Vergine Per sposarci

translation.en: ♪ The first thing ♪
♪ The snow from January is gone ♪
translation.it: Le nevi di gennaio non ci sono più

translation.en: ♪ The flowers of May are here ♪
translation.it: E i fiori di maggio sono qui

translation.en: ♪ You know I've kept it together ♪
translation.it: Vedi, l'ho affrontato da vero uomo

translation.en: ♪ And my bitter pain ♪
What does it say?
Hmm. The same thing all songs talk about.
translation.it: Di ciò di cui parla ogni canzone.

translation.en: And about snow.
[Sarita] Hey, are you coming?
Sure.
[in Finnish] Hi. Did everything go well?
Yes. He had his evening meal and went to bed already.
translation.it: Sì. Ha cenato ed è già a letto.

translation.en: That's great. Thank you so much.
-Be safe. -I will.
I'll be back in a minute.
Can I ask you one thing?
You want to know who the man in the photo is?
translation.it: Vuoi sapere chi è l'uomo nella foto?

translation.en: Yes, how do you know?
I can see it in your face.
He was my husband.
You're divorced?
Remu's friend?
I thought you wanted to ask one question.
It was his brother.
I'm going to close my eyes now.
-Hi. -Hi.
[Sarita] Are you hungry?
Yes.
So?
This isn't your country, Mickey. Nobody cares about ruins.
translation.it: ...non sei nel tuo Paese. A nessuno frega delle regole.

translation.en: But, as it turns out,
call it a morbid curiosity, or whatever,
your comeback interested a couple of promoters.
April 25th, Sweden. An interesting prospect.
Undefeated. All by knockout.
They want you as a stepping stone.
-They're going to be surprised. -How much?
-After taxes, 2 thousand, for you. -Good.
translation.it: Tolte le tasse... Diecimila, per te. Buono.

translation.en: They can pay some upfront. To help our camp.
[Jyrki] So it's a good start. Now it's up to you.
translation.it: È un buon inizio. Ora sta a te.

translation.en: Who's going to coach me?
Come on, tell him.
[Denis] I don't want to waste my time.
-You won't? -You sure you really want to do this?
translation.it: Certo che no. Sei sicuro di farlo?

translation.en: I am.
-OK! -[Jyrki] So, it's done.
Now, you do your thing.
Yes.
Hey, hey. Stop eating that shit in my office.
translation.it: Ehi, non mangiare quello schifo qui.

translation.en: -Now, get the fuck out of here. -OK.
OK, let's go!
[Denis] Corner him!
Work the body, I said.
Where'd you leave your legs, Bayoneta?
translation.it: Dove hai lasciato le gambe, Bayoneta?

translation.en: [Denis] Not so easy, huh? Get up and move faster.
translation.it: Non è così facile, eh? Ora muoviti più veloce.

translation.en: -[Denis] Come on. -[Jyrki] Come on!
-[Miguel] Are you done with that? -One more.
Yes, one more now.
What?
You see that guy at the car? Outside?
He was one of the few who took my brother down.
translation.it: Ha atterrato mio fratello, sul ring.

translation.en: You knew I had a brother, Mickey? He was a fighter too.
translation.it: Sai, avevo un fratello. Lottava anche lui.

translation.en: I watched him get up early in the morning every day to go training.
translation.it: Lo vedevo alzarsi sempre presto per allenarsi

translation.en: And I thought to myself, if anybody wants to get up at 4 a.m. to get a beating
translation.it: e pensavo che se voleva alzarsi presto

translation.en: it's got to be a great thing to do.
I really looked up to him. I begged him to take me training.
translation.it: Lo stimavo molto. Volevo mi portasse all'allenamento.

translation.en: He was so tough, you know? He fought almost every weekend.
translation.it: Era un duro, sai. Combatteva quasi ogni weekend...

translation.en: He never got knocked down until his 56th fight.
First time he got knocked down, we even celebrated it.
translation.it: Al primo KO abbiamo pure festeggiato.

translation.en: He was a true journeyman.
But then, as time went on, he started getting knocked down more often.
translation.it: Poi, col tempo, veniva atterrato più spesso.

translation.en: He'd mostly spring right up again, you know? But...
translation.it: Di solito, sai, si rialzava subito, ma...

translation.en: there was a day when he didn't get up.
translation.it: ...arrivò il giorno in cui non lo fece.

translation.en: It was a bad neurological problem, but he didn't tell.
translation.it: Danni neurologici. Non ne aveva parlato...

translation.en: Not us, not me, or Sarita. And they just had the boy, Emery.
translation.it: ...con noi. Con me o Sarita. Avevano il tipo giusto, Ilmari.

translation.en: The doctor told him he had to stop fighting.
But he didn't give a damn.
He just kept taking punches like a madman, till Sarita found out about his condition,
translation.it: Continuò a incassare come un pazzo finché Sarita non scoprì il suo problema.

translation.en: and threatened to take the boy away if he didn't stop.
translation.it: Doveva smettere, se voleva rivedere il figlio.

translation.en: And then...
Then, he took the ferry to Sweden.
He took his last drink, and...
he jumped into the water, and that was it.
Why are you telling me this?
You're a good man, Mickey.
No, I'm not.
I never met a good guy in this business.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto un bravo ragazzo nel giro.

translation.en: I'm a good guy.
Yes, I fight, but...
I don't want to hurt anyone.
Come on!
You won't last two rounds like that, come on!
translation.it: Così non durerai neanche due round. Dai.

translation.en: Come on, Miguel!
-OK, time. -Fuck.
Can we do this inside?
Can we do this inside? It's the same.
translation.it: Possiamo stare dentro? Tanto è uguale.

translation.en: [Denis] Time.
Go, Bayoneta, go!
Give me one second.
Hey, Mickey, what the fuck?
-[Remu speaks Finnish] -Hey.
Hey.
Thanks for not answering my fucking messages.
translation.it: Non hai risposto ai miei messaggi.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I've been pretty busy.
You told me you were retired.
Yes.
Remu told me about his brother. About your husband.
translation.it: Remu mi ha detto di suo fratello, tuo marito.

translation.en: I didn't call you because I didn't want to cause you more problems.
translation.it: Sono sparito per non darti altri problemi.

translation.en: Yeah, I can take care of myself. I get to do my own decisions.
translation.it: Già. Ma so badare a me stessa. Decido io per me.

translation.en: -[Denis] Mickey, get back here. -Yes, I'm coming.
Go.
[Denis] Those legs are much better now.
Why don't you try to do something with them?
I remember when we were young, we used to go all the time on this cruise ship,
translation.it: Ricordo che da giovani salivamo sempre su questa crociera.

translation.en: get drunk, smoke cigarettes, it was easier to get that stuff.
translation.it: Bevevamo, fumavamo. Ai tempi era più facile farlo.

translation.en: One time, on this one boat, I didn't like the DJ,
translation.it: Una volta, su questa nave, il DJ faceva schifo,

translation.en: so I walked upstairs, on top of him, and took a piss on his neck.
translation.it: così son salito sulle scale sopra di lui e gli ho pisciato in testa.

translation.en: Then both guards came after us, but we got away.
translation.it: Poi le guardie ci hanno inseguiti, ma siamo scappati.

translation.en: -It's me, Jyrki. -Come in.
Hey.
-Tomorrow's the big day. -Yes.
-Who's she? -My daughter.
Don't we look alike?
It's funny, how things happen.
You know? I know you'll make it.
I knew you could make a comeback. I never doubted it.
translation.it: Credevo nel tuo ritorno. Mai dubitato.

translation.en: I'm so thirsty, man. I could drink the whole ocean.
translation.it: Sono così assetato. Potrei bere l'oceano.

translation.en: I told Denis I wanted you to be his assistant.
translation.it: Ho detto a Dennis che voglio tu sia il suo assistente.

translation.en: I still believe that accident isn't enough to break a guy like you.
translation.it: Credo ancora che quell'incidente non basti a sotterrarti.

translation.en: I would've liked to know you then. Your strength.
Your determination.
I wanted my boys to learn that.
translation.it: Volevo che i miei fossero così,

translation.en: To follow your example. Yeah, well.
translation.it: - che seguissero il tuo esempio. - Sì, beh...

translation.en: I'm pretty sure I'm not everything you're saying, but thanks.
translation.it: Non credo di essere come dici, ma... ...grazie.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah.
Yeah.
[in Finnish] Seems like everyone bet their money on you. How does it feel?
translation.it: Tutti hanno scommesso su di te. Come ti fa sentire?

translation.en: [in Finnish] I don't care about money at all. I've trained hard
for this fight, that's all I care about.
Galíndez. Suddenly, you decide to reappear out of nowhere.
translation.it: Galindez, all'improvviso decidi di riapparire dal nulla.

translation.en: How does it feel to get your gloves back on after so long?
translation.it: Cosa provi a indossare i guantoni dopo così tanto?

translation.en: I feel confident. We trained hard.
translation.it: Mi sento fiducioso. Ci siamo allenati bene.

translation.en: I'm as hungry as I was in my first fight.
translation.it: Ho sete di vittoria come la prima volta.

translation.en: [Jaakko] Five years ago, your career came into
translation.it: Cinque anni fa la tua carriera giunse

translation.en: what at the moment seemed like an abrupt and premature end.
translation.it: ad un'apparente fine improvvisa e prematura.

translation.en: What made you decide to make a comeback?
translation.it: Cosa ti ha spinto a tornare?

translation.en: Well, hmm,
this is the only thing I know how to do.
translation.it: È l'unica cosa che so fare.

translation.en: [Yovana in Spanish] Hello?
[Yovana] Hello?
What's up, Yovana, how are you?
I'm your dad.
Please, don't hang up.
[Yovana] What do you want?
Well, I'm going to Tijuana, and...
Remember when we used to go eat lobsters at Cosmos?
translation.it: Ricordi quando mangiavamo l'aragosta al Cosmos?

translation.en: [Yovana crying] Yes.
-[Yovana crying] -I was thinking we could go there, and...
And we could go to the beach, if you want.
translation.it: ...e poi andare in spiaggia, se vuoi.

translation.en: [Yovana] That place was closed years ago.
translation.it: Quel posto ha chiuso tanto tempo fa.

translation.en: [Yovana crying] There was a shooting.
[Yovana] Why did you leave?
♪ And my bitter pain I've kept quiet ♪ SEAFOOD LOBSTER COSMOS WELCOME
Easy.
Just remember, Mickey...
A fighter from our very own city of Stockholm, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.it: Originario della nostra città di Stoccolma, signore e signori,

translation.en: Please welcome the undisputed.
Reigning, defending Scandinavian.
Welterweight champion.
Gunnar Gunther Balasevic!
[narrator] Dear friends, the big question that's surely on everyone's mind is
translation.it: Cari amici, la domanda che è certamente sulla bocca di tutti è:

translation.en: if Miguel "Bayoneta" Galíndez is ready to fight at the top of his weight class.
translation.it: Miguel "Bayoneta" Galindez è davvero pronto a lottare in cima alla sua categoria di peso?

translation.en: [referee] Start!
[Denis] Move forward! Come on, come on! OK, stay light!
[Jyrki] Come on, Mickey!
[Denis] Get him, get up! Yes!
[Denis] A little bit of action!
[Denis] It's OK, breathe, breathe!
[Denis] Yes!
[narrator] The crowd goes wild, did we witness another quick knockout
translation.it: Il pubblico si scatena. Che si tratti di un altro KO da parte del campione?

translation.en: by the Scandinavian champion?
translation.it: Che si tratti di un altro KO da parte del campione?

translation.en: -[Denis] Come on, get up! -Mickey, wake up!
[narrator] Balasevic lands a straight ring on Bayoneta's chin,
translation.it: Balasevic sferra un destro sul mento di Bayoneta,

translation.en: sending him to the canvas like a rag doll.
translation.it: mandandolo sul telone come una pezza.

translation.en: -Yes, yes. -Yes? Keep your guard up, go!
-[referee] Let him go! -[bell ringing]
[narrator] Balasevic attacks. If the Mexican wants to counter those fists,
translation.it: Balasevic attacca. Se il messicano vuole reagire ai pugni, deve ritrovare il vecchio e famoso Bayoneta che c'è in lui.

translation.en: he has to at least find some of that old, famous Bayoneta in him.
translation.it: deve ritrovare il vecchio e famoso Bayoneta che c'è in lui.

translation.en: Keep going, man.
[Remu] Keep your distance. That's it.
[Remu] You got time, you got time!
-[Remu] Yes. -[Denis] Yes.
Come on, move forward.
[Remu] Come on, man!
[man] Go home!
To the right, didn't lose.
[Remu] Watch for his left.
[Denis] Move it, kid, move it!
[Remu] One, two. Yeah! That's it!
[narrator] Balasevic is undoubtedly one of Sweden's most talented boxers,
translation.it: Balasevic è senza dubbio uno dei pugili svedesi più talentuosi,

translation.en: and his ability to take in the punches is truly admirable.
translation.it: e la sua abilità di incassare è ammirevole.

translation.en: But today, he's been steamrolled by a man whose comeback
translation.it: Ma oggi, è stato asfaltato da un uomo il cui ritorno

translation.en: seemed unlikely after his last, tragic fight.
translation.it: sembrava improbabile, dopo l'ultimo tragico incontro.

translation.en: -[bell ringing] -[referee] Go!
[Remu] Yeah, keep your guard up.
[Denis] Come on, Miguel.
Easy. Not yet, one more round.
translation.it: Piano. Aspetta. Ancora un altro round.

translation.en: [Miguel] What did you say?
[Jyrki] Mickey, come on, let's go!
What did you say?
[Miguel] What did you say?
[Jaakko] And look at this, people. What is this man made of?
translation.it: Guardate, signori. Di cosa è fatto quest'uomo?

translation.en: The Swede's chin must be made of steel, and his body of granite.
translation.it: Il mento dello svedese sarà d'acciaio, e il suo corpo di granito.

translation.en: Balasevic's up. Looks like he wants to see this fight to the end, no matter what.
translation.it: Balasevic è in piedi, sembra voglia continuare fino alla fine. Ad ogni costo.

translation.en: The fight is fixed.
-He's letting me win. -[Denis] No, Miguel, he's at your reach.
translation.it: - Mi lascia vincere. - No, Miguel. È alla tua portata.

translation.en: -[Denis] You can get him. -He told me: "One more round."
-He told me: "One more round." -[Denis] No, they wouldn't do that here.
translation.it: - Un round. - No. - Qui non lo farebbero. - Vuole un altro round.

translation.en: He told me: "One more round." They want me to knock him on this one.
translation.it: - Qui non lo farebbero. - Vuole un altro round. - Vogliono che lo mandi KO. - No.

translation.en: -No, Miguel, don't you fucking dare, OK? -Yeah, yeah. No.
translation.it: - Vogliono che lo mandi KO. - No. - Miguel, non osare. Ok? - Ok.

translation.en: [Jaakko] Ladies and gentlemen, what first seemed like a walk in the park
translation.it: Amici, sembrava una passeggiata per Balasevic

translation.en: for Balasevic has turned into a nightmare.
translation.it: sembrava una passeggiata per Balasevic ma si è trasformata in un incubo.

translation.en: [Denis] Come on, Miguel, fight!
[Remu] Get close, come on, come on! Fight, Miguel!
[Denis] What are you doing?
[Jaakko] Something's wrong with Bayoneta,
he's hardly countering any of the punches. He turned his back to his opponent.
translation.it: Reagisce poco ai pugni. Dà le spalle all'avversario.

translation.en: [Jyrki] Come on, fight! [Jyrki] Mickey, you can't do this!
[Denis] Come on, kid! What are you doing?
[narrator] Bayoneta is no longer fighting, which leads to his disqualification.
translation.it: Bayoneta non lotta più, quindi viene squalificato.

translation.en: -[Denis] Fuck! -[crowd booing]
[narrator] From your homes, listening to this broadcast, and there it is again, the sharp cutting jab from Miguel Galíndez,
translation.it: Ecco, ancora una volta, il diretto rapido di Miguel Galindez.

translation.en: marking and limiting the movements
translation.it: Marca il perimetro e domina i movimenti

translation.en: of a confused "Tremendo" Duarte.
translation.it: Marca il perimetro e domina i movimenti del confuso Duarte "Il Terribile".

translation.en: [narrator] We're on our 10th round, and this is madness, friends.
translation.it: Siamo al decimo round ed è un incontro pazzesco.

translation.en: Who's to blame for this atrocity we're witnessing?
A real savagery coming from both corners.
translation.it: Crudeltà da parte di entrambi gli angoli.

translation.en: The referee, who should've stopped this fight, and the medical team.
translation.it: Perché l'arbitro e lo staff medico non fermano tutto?

translation.en: One, two, three, four...
[narrator] This is the main event.
The main event, from Las Vegas, Nevada.
From Libertad, Tijuana.
"Bayoneta" Galíndez!
No one. No one. Mmm.
Fucking shit, man. God damn.
Hail Mary, full of grace. Our Lord is with thee.
translation.it: Ave Maria piena di Grazia, il Signore è con te.

translation.en: Blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus.
translation.it: Benedetta tra le donne e benedetto il frutto del tuo seno, Gesù.

translation.en: What do you think about your dad, Yovana?
translation.it: Che ne pensi di tuo padre, Yovana?

translation.en: I'm the best, bitches, you don't get anything, no sir.
translation.it: Sono migliore di voi, stronzi. Campione di niente, sissignore.

translation.en: Champion of nothing. Bayoneta!
-Bayoneta! -[crowd cheering]
-[Erika] What's wrong? -[Miguel cries]
-[Erika] What's wrong? Baby, what's wrong? -[Miguel cries]
-[Erika] What's wrong? -[Miguel cries]
[Erika] Where are you going, huh?
[Erika] Where are you going, Miguel?
Everything's in order.
[inspector] The bandaging seems to be by the rules. We need to run more tests.
translation.it: Le bende sono regolari. Ma faremo altri test.

translation.en: You may leave.
Miguel? Miguel!
The door was open.
It makes no sense, man.
What?
All the time we spent in the ring.
For you. Take it, Miguel, It's yours.
Take it.
[Miguel] You know nothing, man.
You don't know what it's like to kill someone with your bare hands, dude.
translation.it: Non sai com'è uccidere qualcuno con le proprie mani.

translation.en: You don't know what it's like to hit someone in the face non-stop,
translation.it: Colpirlo in faccia, senza fermarsi, sapendo che gli rovini il cervello.

translation.en: knowing you're fucking up their brain.
translation.it: sapendo che gli rovini il cervello.

translation.en: You don't know what it feels... to hear someone...
translation.it: Non sai com'è... ...quando cade sul telo...

translation.en: falling on the ring, while you already know...
you know he will not get up again.
And he doesn't.
And you start thinking about a lot of things.
About his wife.
His children, dude.
[sighs] His children, dude.
And the hardest part?
translation.it: E sai qual è la cosa peggiore?

translation.en: The hardest part is knowing that all that pain...
is happening because you're a fucking fraud.
-Why did you make me do it, man? -Stop it, there.
How'd you make me do it? Why don't you want to hear it?
translation.it: - Basta. - Perché? - No. - Non vuoi sentirlo.

translation.en: You don't because you are just as guilty as me, man.
translation.it: Non vuoi sentire. Sei colpevole come me.

translation.en: Just as guilty. When are you going to take responsibility for what we did?
translation.it: Colpevole. Quando ti prenderai la responsabilità di questa frode?

translation.en: He put that shit on the bandages.
translation.it: Hai messo quella roba sulle bende?

translation.en: We cheat.
You think I don't know it?
You think I don't think about it every fucking day?
translation.it: Credi non ci pensi ogni cazzo di giorno?

translation.en: I wasn't only about you and me, Mickey. There were a lot of people involved.
translation.it: Non si tratta solo di noi. Sono coinvolte altre persone.

translation.en: It was something bigger than us, and you know it.
translation.it: È una cosa più grande di noi e lo sai.

translation.en: What's up?
[Yovana] Hi.
It's me, your dad.
I know, I can see you.
[Miguel] How are you, Yovana?
It's snowing here, look.
Can you see?
[Yovana] I don't see anything.
[Yovana] You owe me 25 bucks.
For?
I wanted you to win, Miguel.
[in Finnish] Birthday boy.
[in Finnish] Hi.
-[in Finnish] Happy birthday. -[Sarita in Finnish] Hi.
-[in Finnish] Hi. -[in Finnish] Hi.
-[Miguel] Hey. -Hey.
I just wanted to say goodbye.
-You're leaving? -Yeah.
I'm going back to Tijuana.
Do you want to come?
I could bring you and the kid.
-What would I do in such a sunny place? -Yeah.
translation.it: E che farei in un posto così soleggiato? Già.

translation.en: -I had to try. -Yeah.
[Sarita] OK, who wants some cake?
translation.it: Ok, chi vuole un po' di torta?

translation.en: [Sarita] Isn't it nice? Thanks.
[Sarita in Finnish] Is that a bit slanted?
[Sarita in Finnish] It's gorgeous. Isn't it?
[Sarita] I'm happy with it too.
-[man] Did you make this yourself? -[Sarita] Yes, I made it all by myself.
translation.it: L'hai fatta tu? Sì. Tutta da sola.

translation.en: [Remu] So, the birthday boy is here.
[Sarita] This is a bit like...
[Remu] What cake is this?
I think it's a chocolate cake.
translation.it: Credo sia al cioccolato. Ci sono gli zuccherini sopra?

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Ci sono gli zuccherini sopra? Sì.

translation.en: [in Finnish] All the goodies. Here we go, birthday boy first.
translation.it: Tante caramelle. Dai. Prima il festeggiato.
